review: Update: never shoot first ask questions later, never express opinions while angry, one runs the risk of making a fool of himself. The operation problem previously described turned out to be me, not my fire stick. My previous crucifixion of fire stick is unfair. although still second best it wouldn't take much to make it superior. More user friendly menu, a channel store with as many options as the competition your there.  In all other transactions with Amazon it has been obvious they're concerned about providing quality, I have little doubt these issues will addressed and fire stick will be the best. The remote already is regardless of switch bounce. Four stars is fair.
